attributes.action: Stop plan to spend £8m on providing free portraits of King Charles
attributes.additional_details: It is a complete waste of money
attributes.background: The Government has announced plans to spend £8m to provide a free portrait of King Charles to all public bodies. This is a waste of money that could be better spent on providing much needed public services.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636089
